posts.post_content:
Aloha...

Turning my attention to another set and these cards are now available.  Prices are net to me and include tracked shipping. I am trying to buy a mid-grade 1934 WWG Gehrig.  I had one years ago but sold it and it is the one card I wish I still had.  I was selective about registration and centering when I originally bought these cards.  More detailed scans are available upon request.
